review: It was all I expected and more.
author: Grand K. Giffard

review: Bought this for my mother and she loves it.
author: W. Blount "wonkguy"

review: Wish it had a few more apps available.
author: Kelly Cook

review: I have been using Google Chrome, and since i became a prime member, to watch Amazon instant video i purchased this stick. This has a fantastic speed and no lag which i faced in chromecast. The Remote with this helps a lot especially when kids wants to change things. With this we have reduced using Tablets for casting videos as remote and its App helps a lot.
author: karthikeyan

review: Amazing fast, very easy to use. Very good selection of shows.You can even use your Netflix account with it.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I am more satisfied with it than the Apple Tv because it has more options.  I was not using my amazon prime options and now I can do that.  Very satisfied.
author: kbm

review: Still working on all the ins and outs of the stick but loving what I have figured out.

review: It was everything I expected and more.  The picture quality is amazing! !#
